init-param.description: This is the url to point for retrive the original pages. NOTE: The path must end with a "/".
init-param.name: proxyPassHost

init-param.description: Enables or disables the rewrite engine. (Possible values are "enabled" or "disabled"). If is set to "enabled" the links into retrived pages will be rewritten in according to the current proxyma context path (or the "forceSourceUrl" value if provided).
init-param.name: urlRewriteEngine

init-param.description: If you enabled the Url rewrite engine with this parameter you can control javascript handling. There are 2 possible values: rewrite -> try to rewrite urls into javascript code remove -> remove all the javascript code.
init-param.name: javascriptHandlingMode

init-param.description: This option sets the maximum allowed size for the POST data that comes from the client browser. The default value is 64Kb (65536 Bytes) and it should be a good choice for any use. Please note that this parameter could be useful to avoid some kind of DOS attaks based on large POSTS (that cause high memory consumption). To disable this limit set it to 0 (zero).
init-param.name: maxPostDataSize

init-param.description: Enables or disables the debug mode. (Possible values are "true" or "false"). If is "true", the output page will be rendered in plain/text with many useful informations.
init-param.name: debugMode
